GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v4.14.305
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_fs: Prevent race during ffs_ep0_queue_wait

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.305 by commit facf353c9e8d7885b686d9a4b173d4e0af6441d2, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit ddf8abd2599491cbad959c700b90ba72a5dce8d0. For more details please see the references link.
